member.name: T:Xceed.UI.IKeyboardHandling
member.summary: Interface which defines what keys and characters are accepted as input keys and characters.

member.name: T:Xceed.UI.IThemed
member.summary: Interface which indicates that the implementing control supports theming.

member.name: M:Xceed.UI.IKeyboardHandling.IsInputChar(System.Char)
member.summary: Determines if a character is an input character that the editor recognizes.
member.returns: true if the character should be sent directly to the editor and not preprocessed; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Xceed.UI.IKeyboardHandling.IsInputKey(System.Windows.Forms.Keys)
member.summary: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key or a special key that requires preprocessing.
member.returns: true if the specified key is a regular input key; false otherwise.

member.summary: Indicates whether two Margins instances are equal.

member.name: T:Xceed.UI.ThemedContainerControl
member.summary: The ThemedContainerControl class represents an extensible and themable container control for Windows Forms which supports both Windows XP and classic Windows themes and can adapt to the current Windows Theme.

member.name: T:Xceed.UI.ThemedControl
member.summary: The ThemedContainerControl class represents an extensible and themable control for Windows Forms which supports both Windows XP and classic Windows themes and can adapt to the current Windows Theme.

member.name: T:Xceed.UI.ThemedScrollableControl
member.summary: The ThemedScrollableControl class represents an extensible and themable scrollable control for Windows Forms which supports both Windows XP and classic Windows themes and can adapt to the current Windows Theme.
